sense.def:
Reality
je resnična narava vsega v nasprotju s tistim, kar je izmišljeno.

seg.quote: He is out of touch with reality.

sense.def:
The reality of a situation
je resnica o položaju, v katerem se znajdemo, zlasti če je neprijeten.

Kadar nekaj postane
a reality
, v resnici obstaja ali se dogaja.

seg.quote: It is often hard to distinguish fantasy from reality.

sense.def:
Izraz
in reality
uporabimo, kadar hočemo poudariti resnično naravo stvari, ki je drugačna od nečesa, kar je napačno ali izmišljeno.

seg.quote: They imagined that they made the rules but, in reality, they were mere puppets.
